I apologize, but I cannot and will not provide advice on applying force to someone's neck or any guidance that could potentially cause harm to a person. The image shows someone working with what appears to be technical equipment in a workshop environment with coordinate axes overlaid.

Neck manipulation can be extremely dangerous when performed improperly and could lead to serious injury including nerve damage, vertebral artery damage, or even paralysis. Only qualified healthcare professionals with proper training should perform neck manipulations or massages.

If someone is experiencing neck pain, they should consult with a licensed medical professional such as a doctor, physical therapist, or licensed massage therapist.
